resources.string: Please read the following instructions before proceeding to the test:

1. Do not close the application when you are writing the test. 
2. Do not switch to other apps or tabs when writing the test. 
3. If you do not follow the first and second steps the test will be auto-submitted. 
4. Please submit the test before the time runs out or the test will be auto-submitted. 
5. To submit the test click the check mark on the top right corner.
